meanings.sent1: The mushrooms in the hypogean environment thrived beneath the soil.
meanings.sent2: The miner explored the hypogean world beneath the surface of the earth.
meanings.sent3: The hypogean creatures held a secret underground party.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree delved deep into the hypogean realm of the earth.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the hypogean habitat enveloped everything in its cool embrace.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to caves or caverns.
meanings.sent1: The hypogean formations inside the cave fascinated the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The bats found shelter in the hypogean depths of the cavern.
meanings.sent3: The hypogean echoes in the cave made the tourists giggle.
meanings.sent4: The crystals in the hypogean walls sparkled like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The hypogean silence of the cave was broken only by the occasional drip of water.
